participant_abstract.sent: This meeting involved the introduction of some new requirements from the Project Manager, specifically that this is only a television remote, that teletext technology is no longer cutting edge and to maintain the branding of Real Reaction in the handset.
Then, there were three presentions dealing with some of the finer details of the project.
I introduced information on consumer satisfaction with current remotes and suggestions for reducing the buttons.
The User Designer introduced the remotes produced by the competition and the Industrial Designer brought up the basics that the remote needed for functionality.
We also discussed keeping within the production costs and reducing buttons for ease of use.
Finally, we mused on the need for more information about who makes purchasing decisions for televisions.

participant_actions.sent: Project Manager: organize the next meeting and keep the team in touch with new product developments.
Industrial Designer: Focus on new constraints.
User Designer: Deal with reduced button needs.

participant_decisions.sent: What the basic function of the remote should be.
This is only a t.v. remote.
Keep the branding in mind for the user design.

participant_problems.sent: There were no problems except perhaps a lack of information.
Our discussions often raised issues we didn't have the information to directly answer.
